name: vsc-live-share-pocketbase
description: Access other local VSC Live Share sessions by using PocketBase

vscls.pocketbaseUrl.description: The base URL of the PocketBase server, including port and protocol

vscls.pocketbaseAuthEmail.markdownDescription:
**NO LONGER SUPPORTED - run `VSCLS: Configure server` instead**
The admin email to use when authenticating with the PocketBase server. This value cannot be blank.

vscls.pocketbaseAuthPassword.markdownDescription:
**NO LONGER SUPPORTED - run `VSCLS: Configure server` instead**
The admin password to use when authenticating with the PocketBase server. This value cannot be blank.

vscls.thisDeviceName.description: The name of this device, as it will appear in the PocketBase table. You may choose to leave this blank if you'd like to be prompted each time you create a session.

vscls.overwriteExistingProject.description: If true, this will attempt to update an existing DB entry with the new Live Share session details. If a suitable entry doesn't already exist, a new one will be created. If this is set to false, a new DB entry will always be created.
